# JavaScript Notes

## Variables
```javascript
const x = 1;
let y = 2;
var z = 3;
```

## Functions
```javascript
function greet(name) {
  return `Hello, ${name}!`;
}

const arrow = (x) => x * 2;
```

## Array Methods

### map()
Transforms each element.

### filter()
Filters elements based on condition.

### reduce()
Reduces array to single value.
